attributes.action: Dont Use Our Tax Money to Fund Israeli Terrorists
attributes.additional_details:
For many years now, the government has been cutting funds - specially for the unemployed and the elderly... people in the UK are practically living in poverty because benefits have been cut and becoming increasingly difficult to apply for or receive however....
The UK government is using TAX PAYERS MONEY to fund Israeli Terrorists, the likes of who incude Benjamin Netanyahu - israel and its government is a complete bunch of murdering terrorists and yet the UK government is using our money to fund these terrorist activities.

We want UK to stop sending or filtering through even a single penny of OUR TAX MONEY to Israel - the REAL TERRORISTS!!!

We ask the UK government to actively send aid to Palestine; send Doctors, Nurses; actively seek ways to stop this ILLEGAL WAR and bring the TERRORISTS TO JUSTICE; to push for a full investigation for War Crimes against Netanyahu and co; to cut all ties with terrorists
